message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the effects of bacteria on the human body. Bacteria can cause people to become unwell or sick, as they can invade and infect various organs and systems in the body. Option (B) is incorrect because bacteria generally do not cause people to become more energetic. Option (C) is incorrect because bacteria would not typically cause people to become more vibrant. Option (D) is incorrect because bacteria typically do not promote overall health.
